page.title: 08 The Industrial Estate.
page.content: The Industrial Estate was built in 1982 on the site of the ex-railway goods yard.The plan was to create employment opportunities in the village.The factories at present are:No.1. {Coupleworth Display}Employ 4.Design exhibitions.No.2.{R&M Coachworks} Employ 4.Repair and rebuild damaged cars.No.3.{BTB Engineering} Employ 5. Make exhausts and spares and fit them. No.4.{Brian James Trailers} Employ 5. No.5.{Bilbate Ltd.} Make disposable glassware for medical use.Nos.6,7,8, empty.No.9.{Bee Space} Employ 1. Bee equipment specialists.No.10.{Stero Graphics} Employ 2.Make printing plates.Nos.11,12,13,empty.No.14.{Beacon Web} Employ 5.Classified.No.15.{D.P.E.} Employ 15.Mend machines.No.16.{Tonken} Employ 23.Make car accessories.No.17. {Hawkins} Sew shoe uppers.
